verses.verse: And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him, and <S%H6680>charged<s%> him, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> of the <S%H4480>daughters<s%> <S%H1323><s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>

Arise, <S%H6965><s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H6307>Padan-aram,<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1328>Bethuel<s%> thy <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H1>father;<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> thee a <S%H802>wife<s%> from <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> of the <S%H4480>daughters<s%> <S%H1323><s%> of <S%H3837>Laban<s%> thy <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H251>brother.<s%>

And <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> thee, and make thee <S%H6509>fruitful,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> thee, that thou mayest <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H6951>multitude<s%> of <S%H5971>people;<s%>

And <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853>thee<s%> the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> to thee, and to thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> thee; that thou mayest <S%H3423>inherit<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> wherein thou art a <S%H4033>stranger,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto <S%H85>Abraham.<s%>

And <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> sent <S%H7971>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3290>Jacob:<s%> and he <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H6307>Padan-aram<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1328>Bethuel<s%> the <S%H761>Syrian,<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H7259>Rebekah,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob's<s%> and <S%H6215>Esau's<s%> <S%H517>mother.<s%>

When <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> had <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and sent him <S%H7971>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> to <S%H6307>Padan-aram,<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> him a <S%H802>wife<s%> from <S%H4480>thence;<s%> <S%H8033><s%> and that as he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him he gave him a <S%H6680>charge,<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> of the <S%H4480>daughters<s%> <S%H1323><s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan;<s%>
And that <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> <S%H413><s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother,<s%> and was <S%H1980>gone<s%> to <S%H6307>Padan-aram;<s%>
And <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H7200>seeing<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> pleased <S%H7451>not<s%> <S%H5869><s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1>father;<s%>

Then <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> the <S%H802>wives<s%> which he <S%H853>had<s%> <S%H4258>Mahalath<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> <S%H85>Abraham's<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> the <S%H269>sister<s%> of <S%H5032>Nebajoth,<s%> to be his <S%H802>wife.<s%>
And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H4480>Beer-sheba,<s%> <S%H884><s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> toward <S%H2771>Haran.<s%>

And he <S%H6293>lighted<s%> upon a certain <S%H4725>place,<s%> and tarried there all <S%H3885>night,<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> was <S%H935>set;<s%> and he <S%H3947>took<s%> of the <S%H4480>stones<s%> <S%H68><s%> of that <S%H4725>place,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> them for his <S%H4763>pillows,<s%> and lay <S%H7901>down<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> to sleep.

And he <S%H2492>dreamed,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold<s%> a <S%H5551>ladder<s%> set <S%H5324>up<s%> on the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and the <S%H7218>top<s%> of it <S%H5060>reached<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven:<s%> and <S%H2009>behold<s%> the <S%H4397>angels<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5927>ascending<s%> and <S%H3381>descending<s%> on it.

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5324>stood<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> it, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%> thy <S%H1>father,<s%> and the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac:<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>whereon<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H7901>liest,<s%> to thee will I <S%H5414>give<s%> it, and to thy <S%H2233>seed;<s%>

And thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> as the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and thou shalt spread <S%H6555>abroad<s%> to the <S%H3220>west,<s%> and to the <S%H6924>east,<s%> and to the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and to the <S%H5045>south:<s%> and in thee and in thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%> be <S%H1288>blessed.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> am <S%H5973>with<s%> thee, and will <S%H8104>keep<s%> thee in <S%H3605>all<s%> places <S%H834>whither<s%> thou <S%H1980>goest,<s%> and will bring thee <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H127>land;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5800>leave<s%> thee, <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H518><s%> I have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H853><s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to thee of.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H3364>awaked<s%> out of his <S%H4480>sleep,<s%> <S%H8142><s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H403>Surely<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3426>is<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place;<s%> and <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> it <S%H3808>not.<s%>

And he was <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>How<s%> <S%H3372>dreadful<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place!<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> is <S%H369>none<s%> other <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he had <S%H7760>put<s%> for his <S%H4763>pillows,<s%> and set it <S%H7760>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> for a <S%H4676>pillar,<s%> and <S%H3332>poured<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7218>top<s%> of it.

And he <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H1008>Bethel:<s%> <S%H199>but<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of that <S%H5892>city<s%> was called <S%H3870>Luz<s%> at the <S%H7223>first.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H5087>vowed<s%> a <S%H5088>vow,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> me, and will <S%H8104>keep<s%> me in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H1980>go,<s%> and will <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H3899>bread<s%> to <S%H398>eat,<s%> and <S%H899>raiment<s%> to put <S%H3847>on,<s%>
So that I come <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> my <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H7965>peace;<s%> then shall the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> my God: <S%H430><s%>

And <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H68>stone,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H7760>set<s%> for a <S%H4676>pillar,<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H430>God's<s%> <S%H1004>house:<s%> and of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou shalt <S%H5414>give<s%> me I will surely give the <S%H6237>tenth<s%> <S%H6237><s%> unto thee.
